00041 #include <stdio.h>
00042 #include "memvirtu.h"

00048 /* funcao para execucao de listsolid por comando */
00049 #ifdef __Extended_Version
00050 void MSD_execListSolid(void)
00051 {
00052    int sn, sw;
00053 
00054    while (sscanf(restbuf, "%d %d", &sn, &sw) != 2)
00055    {
00056       printf("list: Sid opcao");
00057       if (!lineins("? "))
00058       {
00059          return;
00060       }
00061    }
00062    MSD_highListSolid(sn, sw);
00063 }
00064 
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 int MSD_highListSolid(Id sn, int sw)
00068 {
00069    SPTYPE s;
00070 
00071    if ((s = MSD_getSolid(sn)) == SNIL)
00072    {
00073       fprintf(stderr, "list: solid %d not found\n", sn);
00074       return(ERROR);
00075    }
00076    MSD_lowListSolid(stdout, s, sw);
00077    return(SUCCESS);
00078 }
00079 
00080 void MSD_lowListSolid(FILE *file, SPTYPE s, int sw)
00081 {
00082    DPTYPE d;
00083    FPTYPE f;
00084    VPTYPE v;
00085    EPTYPE e;
00086    HPTYPE l3;
00087 
00088    if (s == SNIL)
00089    {
00090       fprintf(file, "<empty>\n");
00091       return;
00092    }
00093 
00094    fprintf(file, "solid %d:\n", SolSolidNo(s));
00095 
00096    fprintf(file, "faces:\n");
00097    for (AllShellsSolid(s, d))
00098    {
00099       fprintf(file, "shell %d:\n", SheShellNo(d));
00100       for (AllFacesShell(d, f))
00101       {
00102          MSD_lowListFace(file, f, sw);
00103       }
00104    }
00105    if (sw > 1)
00106    {
00107       fprintf(file, "vertices:\n");
00108       for (AllShellsSolid(s, d))
00109       {
00110          fprintf(file, "shell: %d:\n", SheShellNo(d));
00111          for (AllVerticesShell(d, v))
00112          {
00113             fprintf(file, "%d <%5.1f, %5.1f, %5.1f>", VerVertexNo(v),
00114                     VerVCoord(v)[0],
00115                     VerVCoord(v)[1],
00116                     VerVCoord(v)[2]);
00117             if (sw > 3)
00118             {
00119                if ((l3 = VerVEdge(v)) != HNIL)
00120                {
00121                   do
00122                   {
00123                      e = HalEdg(l3);
00124                      fprintf(file, l3 == EdgHe1(e) ? " +" : " -");
00125                      fprintf(file, "<%d,%d>", VerVertexNo(HalVtx(EdgHe1(e))),
00126                              VerVertexNo(HalVtx(EdgHe2(e))));
00127                   } while ((l3 = HalNxt(mate(l3))) != VerVEdge(v));
00128                }
00129             }
00130             fprintf(file, "\n");
00131          }
00132       }
00133    }
00134    if (sw > 100)
00135    {
00136       fprintf(file, "edges:\n");
00137       for (AllShellsSolid(s, d))
00138       {
00139          fprintf(file, "shell %d:\n", SheShellNo(d));
00140          for (AllEdgesShell(d, e))
00141          {
00142             fprintf(file, "v1, v2, f1, f2 = <%d, %d, %d, %d>\n",
00143                     VerVertexNo(HalVtx(EdgHe1(e))),
00144                     VerVertexNo(HalVtx(EdgHe2(e))),
00145                     FacFaceNo(LooLFace(HalWLoop(EdgHe1(e)))),
00146                     FacFaceNo(LooLFace(HalWLoop(EdgHe2(e)))));
00147          }
00148       }
00149    }
00150 }
00151 
00152 void MSD_lowListFace(FILE *file, FPTYPE f, int sw)
00153 {
00154    LPTYPE l;
00155    VPTYPE v;
00156    EPTYPE e;
00157    HPTYPE l3;
00158    int    i, breakline;
00159    vector eq;
00160 
00161    breakline = sw > 2 ? 3 : 8;
00162    fprintf(file, "face no. %d: ", FacFaceNo(f));
00163 
00164    for (AllLoopsFace(f, l))
00165    {
00166       i  = 0;
00167       l3 = LooLEdg(l);
00168       do
00169       {
00170          v = HalVtx(l3);
00171          if ((sw > 2) && ((e = HalEdg(l3)) != ENIL))
00172          {
00173             if (l3 == EdgHe1(e))
00174             {
00175                fprintf(file, "%d -(+(%d,%d))-> ", VerVertexNo(v),
00176                        VerVertexNo(HalVtx(EdgHe1(e))),
00177                        VerVertexNo(HalVtx(EdgHe2(e))));
00178             }
00179             else
00180             {
00181                fprintf(file, "%d -(-(%d,%d))-> ", VerVertexNo(v),
00182                        VerVertexNo(HalVtx(EdgHe1(e))),
00183                        VerVertexNo(HalVtx(EdgHe2(e))));
00184             }
00185          }
00186          else
00187          {
00188             fprintf(file, "%d --> ", VerVertexNo(v));
00189          }
00190          if ((++i % breakline) == 0)
00191          {
00192             fprintf(file, "\n               ");
00193          }
00194       } while ((l3 = HalNxt(l3)) != LooLEdg(l));
00195 
00196       if (l == FacFLOut(f))
00197       {
00198          fprintf(file, "<outer>\n");
00199       }
00200       else
00201       {
00202          fprintf(file, "<inner>\n");
00203       }
00204 
00205       MSD_lowFaceEq(l, eq);
00206       fprintf(file, " <%f, %f, %f, %f>\n", eq[0], eq[1], eq[2], eq[3]);
00207       fprintf(file, "                ");
00208    }
00209    fprintf(file, "\n");
00210 }
